thread.title: Brazil Prosecutors File Charges Against Former Presidential Chief of Staff
thread.title_full: Brazil Prosecutors File Charges Against Former Presidential Chief of Staff - WSJ

author: Luciana Magalhaes
title: Brazil Prosecutors File Charges Against Former Presidential Chief of Staff
text:
SÃO PAULO—Brazilian prosecutors filed criminal charges on Friday against ex-President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva’s former chief of staff and 16 other people for allegedly participating in the corruption scheme involving state-controlled oil company Petróleo Brasileiro S.A., or Petrobras.
José Dirceu served as Mr. da Silva´s chief of staff from 2003 to 2005, when he left the post because of different corruption allegations for which he... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
